attributes.additional_details: MURDER IS MURDER. If a "human being" murders another human then they get a life sentence but if they murder an animal they get a few months. Animals have no voice. We need to stand up for them! Animals suffer in pain and die without any justice! What's a few months in prison? Murderers are murderers end of. We need to wise up and start realising animal cruelty cannot go in forever. We need to act now.
